import './../css/App.css' import React from 'react' import Carte from './map/Carte' import Context from "../context/context" import { useReducer } from 'react' import reducer from './../reducer' import { BrowserRouter as Router, Switch, Route, Redirect, Link } from "react-router-dom" import MarkersList from './markers/MarkersList' import UserForm from "./user/UserForm"; import User from './user/User' const App = () => { const [state, dispatch] = useReducer(reducer, { markers: [] }) return {state.user && } Accueil
Liste } export default App
